node.excerpt: When ClASS101 started to set up a business, only a few developers were able to provide the service. Thus, by using GCP’s Firestore (Google Cloud Platform’s Firestore), we launched the service just in one week without building a proper server. frontmatter.title: Characteristics and Limitations of Google Cloud Platform's Firestore
